approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from an account, on behalf of the account holder.

cap.description: Returns the maximum token supply cap.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint data for a given address and block number.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to another address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power to another address using a signature.

delegates.description: Returns the current delegate for a given address.

getCurrentVotes.description: Returns the current votes for a given address.

getPriorVotes.description: Returns the prior votes for a given address at a specific block number.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of new tokens and adds them to the caller’s account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce of an account, used for permit transactions.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a given address.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

version.description: Returns the current version of the contract.
